content:
Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 25}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 53, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft stripped_birch_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_birch_logs in a 2x2 square on the crafting grid. Therefore I will move one stripped_birch_log from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 25}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 53, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have placed one stripped_birch_log in slot 1, I need to place another in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 53, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have placed two stripped_birch_logs in slots 1 and 2, I need to place another in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 53, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have placed three stripped_birch_logs in slots 1, 2 and 4, I need to place another in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_birch_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 53, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 19, "index": 36}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have placed four stripped_birch_logs in a 2x2 square on the crafting grid, I can craft the stripped_birch_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
